video_prompt: Glowing light rays diagonally flash and shift. Abstract patterns resembling circuitry expand and contract. Metallic gold textures subtly ripple. Neon blue outlines pulse. A stylized "9" loop extends dynamically, connecting to a rotating gear. A central circuit board pattern glows and flickers, with a play button illuminating and dimming. Sparkling blue dots drift across the dark background.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Digital artwork featuring "civital" in metallic gold with glowing blue outlines and tree-like "i" and "l" toppings. Below, "C29" in similar gold, with the "9" forming a blue neon loop connecting to a silver-grey gear. The gear's center glows with blue circuit patterns, containing a prominent blue "play" button made of small squares. A green laurel branch extends from "C29." The dark blue background is adorned with diagonal glowing blue light rays and sparkling blue dots, creating a high-tech/futuristic ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: Diagonal light rays flash and shift. Circuitry patterns expand and contract. Gold textures subtly ripple. Neon blue outlines pulse. A stylized "9" loop extends, connecting to a rotating gear. A central circuit board flickers, its play button illuminating and dimming. Sparkling blue dots drift across the background.
